title: How to search particular text from a text file using java regular expression?
body: I have text file containg multiple times "Vijay Patil" or "Vijay Jeevana Patil" keyword or like that.I have to write a regular expression to search Vijay Patil if there is some text between Vijay Patil like "Vijay Jeevana Patil" it will give also return for that.
